website_summaries.verdict: The well adored classic silhouette gets a pretty makeover making it more lovable and stunning. The Keds Champion Micro Dot features the heritage profile of the Champion with microdot print all over its canvas upper that sits on top of a wrap-around textured midsole. This sneaker enhances one's look without waiving the comfort, durability, and lightness. The Keds Champion Micro Dot is considered a must-have for practical buyers who want to run their errands in little speck of style and comfort.
pros: The majority of the respondents praised the breathable upper of the Keds Champion Micro Dot
Many of the reviewers liked the stylish and easy to style profile of this sneaker
Most of them felt comfortable while wearing the Champion Micro Dot
Most reviewers found that this sneaker fits true to size
Few revealed that this is a suitable all-around sneaker
Several users highly recommended this footwear to their friends
A couple of buyers have suggested this pair for traveling because it is easy to pack and can match any ensemble
The lightness of this model is commendable, shared a few reviewers
This shoe has two sets of laces - tonal and microdot design
Few shared that this pair is quite flexible
Buyers can select from multiple colorways offered in the market
cons: One buyer criticized that the Keds Champion Micro Dot provides poor stability
A handful griped about the tad narrow width of this shoe

customer_reviews.title: Practical, stylish casual sneaker
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so cute for casual days! I normally wear a size 8.5M but had to exchange for size 8M because the front of the shoe was too long (and I have long toes). My feet/ankles are relatively thin/bony, and these shoes fit very well. They stay on well. While there is basically no arch support and only mild-moderate traction, that wasn't what I was looking for in this canvas shoe. These are great for people without foot or joint problems, and look very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Shop

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for swing dancing because I wanted my wide toes to be comfortable. These might be a little too wide for ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute! These definitely have enough room in the toes and sides to accommodate wide feet. I bought these for swing dancing because I wanted my wide toes to be comfortable. These might be a little too wide for dancing, as I like for my shoes to be a little snug so I don't misstep. The inside turn my socks colors.
customer_reviews.author: ala05a

customer_reviews.title: They are good but the material used on these shoes are a ...
customer_reviews.text: They are good but the material used on these shoes are a bit stiff. I ordered a half size up coz of my wide feet but I shouldn't have. They have exact shoe size so ordering your normal size would be just great. Looks very fashionable though!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe; great selection; a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: The only reason Keds doesn't get a 5 star from me is the lack of arch support; having said that, I love Keds. The simple shoe is timeless and washable. I've been wearing Keds since I was a kid and even with the arch support problem, I keep coming back to them. They have gone up in price over the years and the construction hasn't improved but it is still a great shoe when you can get them for around $20.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They do not have arch support, but even still, I wore them almost everyday/all day during a trip abroad this summer. If you spray them with a protective coating before wearing them the first time, they stay like-new for a very long time and you can wipe the white sole of the shoe to clean it fairly well. I like the micro dot design as well - a different take on the classic Keds. I received lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eliza

customer_reviews.title: I have narrow feet but the medium fits fine with a slipper sock
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Keds for many years. I own 13 pair that I've accumulated over time. I have narrow feet but the medium fits fine with a slipper sock. I ordered my usual size. I like the gray micro dot so much I returned and ordered the green. I wear one pair of Keds or another practically every day year round. I have the winter styles and summer styles. I will watch the price on the other colors of these shoes and will probably order more if the price drops like it did for the gray and green.
customer_reviews.author: B. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds and these are so cute. If you have special needs with your shoes like good arch support I don't think these are for you. But for the rest of us these are comfortable. I wear them all day with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Pinupgirl

customer_reviews.title: need breaking in
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 7.5-8, got size 7.5 and they fit well. Was pleasantly surprised that there is some modest arch support; my previous Keds had an absolutely flat sole. One qualm: they took a bit of breaking in. They look very comfortable, but initially they were very rigid and hurt the feet. I could only tolerate them for a few hours. After a few weeks of modest wear (a few hours a day), they are now perfectly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: eke

customer_reviews.title: Nice but NARROW
customer_reviews.text: First of all: NARROW. Be aware of that. So if your foot is wide by anyone's standard, order up a full size. I ordered up a half size, and though they'll work, the 'breaking in" process is more stressful on my foot than need be. Love the berry/burgundy color, and the dots are super fun. If they had rubber toes, they'd be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Earthspirit

customer_reviews.title: Cute but narrow!
customer_reviews.text: As stated by other reviewers, these shoes really are quite narrow. I wear a standard medium width, and while these Keds do fit, my feet feel claustrophobic after a while and I have to change shoes. Don't think I could wear them all day. I thought about returning them but the price was outstanding and the polka dots are simply too cute. I'll just have my local shoe repair guy throw them on the stretcher for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Olive Oyl

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds! I bought my first pair several years ago,and am just now buying my second. These are adorable, they're well made, sturdy, and adorable! They are white, so I will have to be careful in getting them dirty, but overall these are super cute, super comfortable... I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Spaggiari

customer_reviews.title: Keds, but not really Keds.
customer_reviews.text: These are the same shoes Costco sold under a different brand. They too also were too large for the stated size. I think these Kids are 'off shore' copies of the original, real Keds. I have been buying/wearing Keds for years and always wear a 9. I bought Costco ones a few years back and they are too big, about a half size. After bringing home these "Keds", I measured and compared them to my no name brand Costco and they are identical. True Keds fit perfectly and are slightly different from these. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Nina MacKay

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes for Traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these sneakers to bring with on our honeymoon to Ireland. They were perfect! They didn't take up a ton of room in the suitcase and matched so many neutral colored outfits. They were very comfortable and I was able to wear them day after day without any pain. Excellent purchase-- I'll be buying more Keds in the future after this great experience!
customer_reviews.author: summr.reader

customer_reviews.title: Cute casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are cute casual shoes. I had another pair of these, but after about two years of frequent wear they were falling apart. I really liked them though, so I bought a new pair. I typically wear a size 10.5, but the size 10 in the Keds fit well. At first the shoes are a little stiff, but they break in quickly. Also, there is no arch support, but they are still comfy and, most importantly, cute!
customer_reviews.author: Barrett K.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. I have wide feet and ordered a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I have wide feet and ordered a normal width but a half size up. They are still a little snug around the knuckles of my feet... but I'll get them broken in eventually. These shoes are adaquately described by the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: These shoes make me happy <3
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to wear these only on vacation, just to give my converse a break. (I don't wear shoes 2 days in a row, they last longer) I ended up loving them! I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a trip to Washington DC as I was looking for comfortable footwear with a hint of fun. These canvas black and white dotted shoes hit the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: liked the look but not very comfortable i say somewhat ...
customer_reviews.text: liked the look but not very comfortable i say somewhat large because i feel like my heel comes up when i walk. i guess I'm too used to sport sneakers. these just feel funny on but of love the look. only thing is i need more support
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get them you will not regret it
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are amazing so comfortable and run true to size. I ordered my regular size, 8.5, and they fit perfect. I have other keds that tend to run against the back of my ankles but these don't! They're great n I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Claribel

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Great support and style. Good for ease when shopping or running errands while still looking trendy.
customer_reviews.author: LinGrif

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I love them...the shoes are a little bigger than a regular size. I think they're sort of in the size family as the Converse where your size has extra room. However, they're beautifully made and exquisite. Me like!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Cute polka dots
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift and they are super cute. They seem to be very comfy and light. My friend wears them all the time since I've gifted them to her.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: 5/5 ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes! I definitely recommend ordering the size you normally wear because I ordered a half size down assuming they would be too big but they would've fit a lot better in my normal size. Well that's my own fault and the more I wear them the more they break in. They're very comfortable and I always get compliments on them! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Dottie Kids
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were going to be more "true " red. But everything else was right on.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Myrup

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these after seeing them in a store that ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after seeing them in a store that didn't have my size. They are traditional canvas Keds and fit well. I get a lot of compliments on the style whenever I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are cute and very light! I did ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are cute and very light! I did get a blister on my heel from wearing them but now that I've broken them in they aren't causing irritation whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Alli N.

customer_reviews.title: They fit perfect and I receive compliments on them every time I ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect and I receive compliments on them every time I wear them. They are definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Larke

customer_reviews.title: Defective Keds
customer_reviews.text: I got my nice sneakers at the begining of August, I used them couple times within a month, yesterday I realized the are ripped and I cannot even get a replacement. Such a shame, I love Keds.
customer_reviews.author: sil e

customer_reviews.title: GReat comfort and value
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of these! I love Keds! Fits great! Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 7 1/2 in heels and sneakers and 7 in flats like these(I don't count them as sneakers). They seemed narrow so I bought a 7 1/2 and they fit GREAT! They're a bit long on me but the width is perfect for my wide foot. I'll just buy something to keep my heel from slipping out. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bri R

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great keds quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great Keds quality. Fit just right and they are super cute. They are like a dark wine color/ beet redish purplish with white polka dots.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mango

customer_reviews.title: ... daily since they arrived 6 weeks ago - I love them! Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these almost daily since they arrived 6 weeks ago - I love them! Cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: so cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love basic keds, but these are super fun. The mini dots make these really cute. Standard Keds fit. Light weight. Ready for summer casual wear
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stylish and comfy shoes! Love them!
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this brand and I am hooked! Love them, and love how they look on me. Plus they are very stylish and comfortable. Will be buying more!!!
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2BzKids

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite sneakers! What a fantastic bargain! And such a versatile print- goes with so much!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy S.

customer_reviews.title: I love Keds.
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds...I've had a couple of them already. I can wear them all day too. They're are very cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kalia Vang

customer_reviews.title: comfortable all day
customer_reviews.text: Wear very well, comfortable all day. Seems slightly larger than the original keds
customer_reviews.author: White215

customer_reviews.title: Cute but much too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Cute but runs VERY narrow, not true to size. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoes but they have pretty much no arch support
customer_reviews.author: nwonder87

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and comes with two sets of laces
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Super cute and comes with two sets of laces, like Keds do
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Matthews

customer_reviews.title: UReally like these Keds and that they came with both white ...
customer_reviews.text: UReally like these Keds and that they came with both white and blue laces. I added an inner sole for arch support, which greatly increased the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have wide feet and im on day 3 of breaking them in and they are feeling good.
customer_reviews.author: andrea m

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love keds and for the price you can't beat them! They are so comfy and I can walk in them for hours! I also particularly like this color, it's like a dark royal blue
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I know in this style of Keds to go down 1/2 a size. They also come with white laces.
customer_reviews.author: DeLight

customer_reviews.title: Love the red shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so cute! I always get complements when I wear them. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are perfect with my ortho inserts, love the print on them...
customer_reviews.author: gayle pepper-mcclean

customer_reviews.title: Too small and waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Cute but too small all over. Bought two pairs with different designs, sending both of them back ASAP!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect on so many levels, they go with everything and are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. These shoes have lasted over a year with wear and tear. Very cute and nice to walk in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great pair of Keds
customer_reviews.text: I like these fashion sneakers. While the support is not that of athletic shoes, they are really comfortable and good for regular wear. The dot design is subtle but gives the shoes some flair.
customer_reviews.author: lindiana53

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 6 or 6.5. I purchased the 6 and they fit perfectly! I love these shoes because they are comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality shoes. I like the color and the design. Width was a good it, but they were longer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Perfect keds
customer_reviews.text: Love these keds. These were the same fit as I would have bought in the store. Great price as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Myday

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've loved Keds for years. Every year I buy a pair. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina K

customer_reviews.title: like every other pair I've ordered
customer_reviews.text: I order a pair of Keds every year for summertime wear. These, like every other pair I've ordered, are comfortable and CUTE. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: The best kind of dotted....
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I am using the black laces not the white ones and then pair them up with a black/white dotted dress! I LOVE that you get two different color of laces with each pair you buy, what a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: ProShopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keds' shoes are always super comfortable, and not that expensive, i love it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: yan%

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the red color.They look nice with jeans,shorts or dresses.I've got many keds before and they're all just sooooo cute!
customer_reviews.author: olibra

customer_reviews.title: She always loves her Keds
customer_reviews.text: Always can count on my wife loving Keds shoes as a gift. She loves them and these were no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin' Grandpa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these shoes. I'm using them for swing dancing.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute but they rub extremely bad blisters every time I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Erinwaterson

customer_reviews.title: I bought this shoe to walk around in New York ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe to walk around in New York City. It survives the subways well and barely shoes any grime.
customer_reviews.author: ggr3

customer_reviews.title: It is great and comfy
customer_reviews.text: It is great and comfy! It might get a little smelly if you don't wear them with socks for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking show
customer_reviews.text: Great looking show, exactly as described. They feel more comfy the longer you wear them. Great for swing dancing, which is what I purchased them for.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them, very stylish and comfortable. I love my keds!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are far skinnier and longer than the pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are far skinnier and longer than the pictures show. I ordered a size 7 and they ended up being a bit too long on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: sizing is off. I wear a 61/2 and theses fell off my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Merrick Inc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: usually wear a 7 in everything, always buy 6.5 in keds Champion styles

customer_reviews.title: It's not very comfortable to walk either
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Keds. This pair of shoes is way too hard and poorly-made comparing with others I have bought. It's not very comfortable to walk either!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fun, cute, I put the black shoelaces on them and they look a little dressier.

customer_reviews.title: Great Keds quality as expected
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Great Keds quality as expected!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: only problem was i sprayed them w/ water repellant and it yellowed the sneakers

customer_reviews.title: So cute! I purchased these in red and I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I purchased these in red and I'm obsessed. 😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the 8, but needed the 7.5. I love these shoes. Very cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You better get 'em
customer_reviews.text: Hey! I just got my Keds, ordered them and they shipped quickly, and I LOVE them! Got my size 9, a regular fit, and as soon as they came in I slipped them on and walked all over! Must have! Might buy the white with blue dots!
customer_reviews.author: Kyana

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: May be a little tight in the toe box, but I expect that to loosen as I wear them more. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reed

customer_reviews.title: They're so cute and make your foot look nice and slim
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing them basically everyday since I have gotten them. They're so cute and make your foot look nice and slim. Easy to slip on and doesn't make my feet hurt after long hours of walking. They are for sure my go to shoes!
customer_reviews.author: leanna le

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Champion Micro Dot Lace Up Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: A clean, cool, classic style. Cotton terry lining and arch support make this comfortable KEDS MICRO DOT white canvas sneaker an undisputable wardrobe essential for every woman.
feature_bullets: Lace-up fashion sneaker in micro-dot print featuring brass-tone eyelets and logo on tongue
